post.body: Yes it gonna continue according to Merbist,however we r waiting new chapters to finish so that we translate,how about contributing?
Did anyone mentioned grails here? please share me the info, tomorrow my manager is gonna take the final desicion regarding grails!!
i was planning to blog some of new changes, but it really needs a book, not just several posts
, yes so cool
a very big thanks for ur support, it's highly appreciated

3 hours to write the first draft of symbols post...
I'm done with linux, i want a Mac, not pro for sure, i can't afford it. anyway i think i'm geting it from Dubai or Amman...
blogging about ruby symbols, it seems hard for ppl to accept it's fact!

watching functional programming, jruby, rails thread safety and what rubiests should know about threads from rubyconf2008

is thinking whether to blog on functional programming and ruby... it's hard somehow to blog in details about it....

it's -1° here
Working on new article :) , writing is really hard job...
